name: CMSSignedAttributes
desc: Optional attributes you can add to a signed message.

items.name: static var attrSmimeCapabilities: CMSSignedAttributes
items.desc: Identify signature, encryption, and digest algorithms supported by the encoder.

items.name: static var attrSmimeEncryptionKeyPrefs: CMSSignedAttributes
items.desc: Indicate that the signing certificate included with the message is the preferred one for S/MIME encryption.

items.name: static var attrSmimeMSEncryptionKeyPrefs: CMSSignedAttributes
items.desc: Indicate that the signing certificate included with the message is the preferred one for S/MIME encryption, but using an attribute object identifier (OID) preferred by Microsoft.

items.name: static var attrAppleCodesigningHashAgilityV2: CMSSignedAttributes
items.desc: Include Apple codesigning hash agility, version 2.
